Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Outreach \Out*reach"\, v. t. To reach beyond. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
outreach \outreach\ n. 1. The act of reaching out; an effort to build connections from one person or group to another; as, the Police Department insituted a community outreach program. [PJC]
2. The extension of assistance or services to persons or groups not previously served. [PJC]
outreach n : the act of reaching out; "the outreach toward truth of the human spirit"
